name: International Conference on Advanced Research in Supply Chain Management.
content: We will be in Berlin, Germany on December 17-19, 2021 for the International Conference on Advanced Research in Supply Chain Management. SUPPLYCHAINCONF 2021 is the premier supply chain event that will feature a roster of expert panelists speaking on a range of important topics in the field including Logistics Planning, Warehouse Management, Supply Chain Strategy, Control & Automation, Supply Chain Optimization, Information Technology Logistics, Energy Management, Facilities Management Sustainability, Material management, Distribution Management, Inventory Control, Supply Chain Risk, and many other interesting topics. The SUPPLYCHAINCONF Supply Chain Conference will provide an environment unlike anything else designed to exchange knowledge, educate, inspire, and connect academicians, scholars, students, speakers, and professionals from across the world. Attendees will also enjoy networking opportunities during the sessions and at a free guided tour of the landmarks of Berlin.
